dataset.title: Records of vascular plants, bryophytes and lichens from Ukrainian Grassland Database

creator.organizationName: M.G. Kholodny Institute of Botany NAS of Ukraine

metadataProvider.organizationName: M.G. Kholodny Institute of Botany NAS of Ukraine

abstract.para: The database includes a releves of grassland vegetation of Ukraine, carried out by 66 authors over the period from 1932 to 2019. The releves are made in almost all administrative regions of Ukraine. The size of plots ranged from 0,5 to 400 m2. The nomenclature is given in accordance the species list “Russia”, which is based on a checklist of S. Cherepanov (1995) for vascular plants, M. Ignatov & O. Afonina checklist (1992) for mosses and the Lichens Identification Guides of the USSR (1971–1978)

additionalInfo.para: Ukrainian Grassland Database registered in GIVD (https://www.givd.info/ID/EU-UA-001), and member of the European Vegetation Archive (EVA) (http://euroveg.org/eva-database-participating-databases), sPlot (https://www.idiv.de/en/sdiv/working_groups/wg_pool/splot/splot_database.html) and GrassPlot database (https://edgg.org/databases/GrassPlot)

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY-NC) 4.0 License.

description.para: The data is updated after each field season

contact.organizationName: M.G. Kholodny Institute of Botany NAS of Ukraine

description.para: The database is stored in the Turboweg program environment, which includes standardized species lists for different countries and regions, which makes it impossible to use unverified nomenclature, and additional checks are used when exchanging data between different databases using different species lists. Moreover, the database is part of the European Vegetation Archive (EVA), where there is also a constant check of the data quality, followed by their correction if necessary.

Phytosociological database collected for the purpose of classification of vegetation and habitats. Includes more than 10.000 relevés of grassland vegetation and related open vegetation within the administrative boundaries of Ukraine

samplingDescription.para: Most of the data were collected in accordance with the methodological approaches of the Braun-Blanquet school in the vegetation plots mainly in the range of 10-25 m2 with records of the full floristic composition (shoot or root presence) and cover of each species in% or abundance scales. Some of the plots (mostly 1950-1980s) were collected using the Soviet dominant approach on 100 m2 plots.

description.para: Over the years of the database existence (created in 2008, officially registered in GIVD in 2011) there is a constant checking and polishing of data. Some of the records are confirmed by herbarium speciements and photographs. But mostly the data quality is the responsibility of the authors of the relevés.

project.title: Mobilization of biodiversity data from Ukraine to GBIF

abstract.para: Dataset has been organized with the support of Project nlbif2018.2019.004 funded by NLBIF to The Habitat Foundation "Mobilization of biodiversity data from Ukraine to GBIF" https://www.nlbif.nl/mobilization-of-biodiversity-data-from-ukraine-to-gbif/

Records of vascular plants, bryophytes and lichens from Ukrainian Grassland Database. M.G. Kholodny Institute of Botany, National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine. Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/w4yz9s accessed via GBIF.org on 2022-02-08.
